name: Cruisin' Caribbean: Grand Prix
description:
Cruisin' Caribbean: Grand Prix is a game where you race a dinghy in a beautiful tropical circuit to obtain the best time. 

Current High Score: 0:33:03

Please post a screenshot with your best attempt below!

Description:

The game is based on Wave Racer, which appeared for both the N64, and the Nintendo Gamecube. Sadly, no game was ever made for the Gameboy Advance, so we created a GBA version. It uses the original GBA color palette and resolution. 

It is created for the Retro-Jam 2021.

The intro and finish tune are from Digimon Battle Spirit 2. Aside from some fonts, all other assets were created from scratch.

Thanks for checking out our first game!
